enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Reserved for Sophomores, Juniors, and Seniors from every undergraduate school only.
title: SoC COMM_ST 395-0-23 Topics in Communication Studies

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: In this course we will examine children's communication across development. This course will provide an overview of the complex ways in which children and adolescent engage in interpersonal communication with peers and family members as well as the interactions that children have with and in the context of media technology. To study these interpersonal and mass communication patterns in children we will read handbook chapters and empirical research articles.

subject: COMM_ST
